feed.title: RecipeSage Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for RecipeSage: v2.15.12
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • chore: browserless v2 backport by @julianpoy in https://github.com/julianpoy/RecipeSage/pull/1511
  • chore: prettier by @julianpoy in https://github.com/julianpoy/RecipeSage/pull/1513

Full Changelog: https://github.com/julianpoy/RecipeSage/compare/v2.15.11...v2.15.12

entry.title: New release for RecipeSage: v2.15.13
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • feat: use legacy api for v2.15.12 due to breaking changes by @julianpoy in https://github.com/julianpoy/RecipeSage/pull/1525

Full Changelog: https://github.com/julianpoy/RecipeSage/compare/v2.15.12...v2.15.13

entry.title: New release for RecipeSage: v2.15.14
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • fix: legacy api url by @julianpoy in https://github.com/julianpoy/RecipeSage/pull/1526

Full Changelog: https://github.com/julianpoy/RecipeSage/compare/v2.15.13...v2.15.14

entry.title: New release for RecipeSage: v3.0.0
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • feat: Update Page Title When viewing recipe by @Spencerhutch in https://github.com/julianpoy/RecipeSage/pull/1467
  • fix(l10n): translations update from weblate.recipesage.com by @recipesage-weblate in https://github.com/julianpoy/RecipeSage/pull/1473
  • feat: import job system by @julianpoy in https://github.com/julianpoy/RecipeSage/pull/1475
  • fix: pad start of import label timestamp by @julianpoy in https://github.com/julianpoy/RecipeSage/pull/1478
  • fix(l10n): translations update from weblate.recipesage.com by @recipesage-weblate in https://github.com/julianpoy/RecipeSage/pull/1476
  • fix(l10n): translations update from weblate.recipesage.com by @recipesage-weblate in https://github.com/julianpoy/RecipeSage/pull/1479
  • chore(deps): bump the npm_and_yarn group across 1 directory with 2 updates by @dependabot in https://github.com/julianpoy/RecipeSage/pull/1480
  • fix(l10n): translations update from weblate.recipesage.com by @recipesage-weblate in https://github.com/julianpoy/RecipeSage/pull/1481
  • chore(deps): bump nanoid from 3.3.7 to 3.3.8 in the npm_and_yarn group across 1 directory by @dependabot in https://github.com/julianpoy/RecipeSage/pull/1484
  • fix(l10n): translations update from weblate.recipesage.com by @recipesage-weblate in https://github.com/julianpoy/RecipeSage/pull/1485
  • fix(l10n): translations update from weblate.recipesage.com by @recipesage-weblate in https://github.com/julianpoy/RecipeSage/pull/1486
  • chore(deps): bump the npm_and_yarn group across 1 directory with 2 updates by @dependabot in https://github.com/julianpoy/RecipeSage/pull/1489
  • fix(l10n): translations update from weblate.recipesage.com by @recipesage-weblate in https://github.com/julianpoy/RecipeSage/pull/1488
  • feat: remember pinned recipes, recipe completion, recipe completion reset button by @julianpoy in https://github.com/julianpoy/RecipeSage/pull/1493
  • feat: comprehensive offline read-only sync using indexeddb by @julianpoy in https://github.com/julianpoy/RecipeSage/pull/1496
  • fix: tile view on small screens by @julianpoy in https://github.com/julianpoy/RecipeSage/pull/1498
  • feat: many small improvements by @julianpoy in https://github.com/julianpoy/RecipeSage/pull/1499
  • fix(l10n): translations update from weblate.recipesage.com by @recipesage-weblate in https://github.com/julianpoy/RecipeSage/pull/1500
  • fix: friends mapping error, get similar recipes cache by @julianpoy in https://github.com/julianpoy/RecipeSage/pull/1501
  • feat: caching improvements & assistant messaging improvements by @julianpoy in https://github.com/julianpoy/RecipeSage/pull/1502
  • feat: add settings manual sync option by @julianpoy in https://github.com/julianpoy/RecipeSage/pull/1503
  • fix(l10n): translations update from weblate.recipesage.com by @recipesage-weblate in https://github.com/julianpoy/RecipeSage/pull/1504
  • feat: add more route caching and functionality offline, improved localdb typings by @julianpoy in https://github.com/julianpoy/RecipeSage/pull/1505
  • fix: improve localdb migration strategy by @julianpoy in https://github.com/julianpoy/RecipeSage/pull/1506
  • fix(l10n): translations update from weblate.recipesage.com by @recipesage-weblate in https://github.com/julianpoy/RecipeSage/pull/1507
  • fix: assistant tool calling by @julianpoy in https://github.com/julianpoy/RecipeSage/pull/1508
  • feat: move to browserless v2 by @julianpoy in https://github.com/julianpoy/RecipeSage/pull/1512
  • feat: import pdfs & images, improve clip from URL, direct to discord, new languages enabled by @julianpoy in https://github.com/julianpoy/RecipeSage/pull/1515
  • fix(l10n): translations update from weblate.recipesage.com by @recipesage-weblate in https://github.com/julianpoy/RecipeSage/pull/1514
  • fix: various issues & sentry by @julianpoy in https://github.com/julianpoy/RecipeSage/pull/1516
  • feat: improvements to new session and caching behavior by @julianpoy in https://github.com/julianpoy/RecipeSage/pull/1518
  • chore: improve sentry environment handling by @julianpoy in https://github.com/julianpoy/RecipeSage/pull/1519
  • fix(l10n): translations update from weblate.recipesage.com by @recipesage-weblate in https://github.com/julianpoy/RecipeSage/pull/1521
  • fix: various improvements by @julianpoy in https://github.com/julianpoy/RecipeSage/pull/1522
  • fix(l10n): translations update from weblate.recipesage.com by @recipesage-weblate in https://github.com/julianpoy/RecipeSage/pull/1523
  • feat: performance by @julianpoy in https://github.com/julianpoy/RecipeSage/pull/1524
  • fix(l10n): translations update from weblate.recipesage.com by @recipesage-weblate in https://github.com/julianpoy/RecipeSage/pull/1528
  • feat: add enex (evernote) import support by @julianpoy in https://github.com/julianpoy/RecipeSage/pull/1529
  • fix(l10n): translations update from weblate.recipesage.com by @recipesage-weblate in https://github.com/julianpoy/RecipeSage/pull/1531
  • fix(l10n): translations update from weblate.recipesage.com by @recipesage-weblate in https://github.com/julianpoy/RecipeSage/pull/1532
  • fix(l10n): translations update from weblate.recipesage.com by @recipesage-weblate in https://github.com/julianpoy/RecipeSage/pull/1537
  • feat: expire entries out of completion tracker after period of time by @julianpoy in https://github.com/julianpoy/RecipeSage/pull/1538
  • feat: localdb sync improvements by @julianpoy in https://github.com/julianpoy/RecipeSage/pull/1539
  • chore(deps): bump the aws group with 3 updates by @dependabot in https://github.com/julianpoy/RecipeSage/pull/1543

  • @Spencerhutch made their first contribution in https://github.com/julianpoy/RecipeSage/pull/1467

Full Changelog: https://github.com/julianpoy/RecipeSage/compare/v2.15.9...v3.0.0

entry.title: New release for RecipeSage: v3.0.1
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • fix: in-app sharing between users by @julianpoy in https://github.com/julianpoy/RecipeSage/pull/1706
  • chore(deps): bump the sentry group with 3 updates by @dependabot in https://github.com/julianpoy/RecipeSage/pull/1704
  • chore(deps): bump the aws group with 3 updates by @dependabot in https://github.com/julianpoy/RecipeSage/pull/1703
  • chore(deps-dev): bump the eslint group with 2 updates by @dependabot in https://github.com/julianpoy/RecipeSage/pull/1700
  • chore(deps-dev): bump @types/multer from 1.4.12 to 1.4.13 in the multer group by @dependabot in https://github.com/julianpoy/RecipeSage/pull/1698

Full Changelog: https://github.com/julianpoy/RecipeSage/compare/v3.0.0...v3.0.1
